Chinonso Nnamdi Offor (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2000) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ dịka onye ọgbọsọ n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ Major League Soccer club CF Montreal

A mụrụ Offor n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2000 na Jos, Naịjirịa mana o tolitere na Ekwulobia dị na steeti Anambra mgbe ọ gbapụrụ na Jos n'ihi ọgba aghara. N'afọ 2012, ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ Real Sapphire dị na Lagos. N'afọ 2017, Offor kwagara Northern Cyprus wee sonye na Binatlı Yılmaz, òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ na-esoghị na FIFA maọbụ UEFA.

N'afọ 2019, Offor natara onyinye ịbanye n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ Latvian Daugavpils wee bịanye aka isoro ha gbaa bọọlụ n'afọ ahụ. N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2019, Offor mere asọmmpi mbụ ya n'òtù ahụ, megide òtù Jelgava maka iko Latvian, wee merie ha 2 - 1. N'egwuregwu ọzọ n'etítì òtù egwu bọọlụ Virslīga megide Jelgava,  o nyere ọkpụ goolu mmeghe na nkeji nke abụọ, nke mechara gwụ na 2-2 draw. Offor mechiri oge mbụ ya na Latvia site n'inye ọkpụ goolu isii n'ugboro iri na anọ ọ gbara bọọlụ
N'afọ sochirinụ, Offor gbara goolu mbụ ya n'afọ ahụ na 25 June 2020 na mmeri 6 - 0 Tukums 2000. Offor wee gbaa bọọlụ mbụ ya na 29 June na mmeri 4-2 na Metta.

N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, Offor kwagara RFS, kwa a Latvian league. O mere nke mbụ ya wee gbaa goolu mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na 21 Julaị na mmeri 3 - 0 megide Tukums 2000. Ọ gwụchara oge nke abụọ ya na Latvia na egwuregwu 21 na goolu 10 ọ gbara.

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, Offor sonyeere klọb bọọlụ Major League Soccer Chicago Fire. O mere nke mbụ ya maka Fire na 17 Eprel 2021 megide New England Revolution, malite na 2-2 draw. Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Fire na 7 Julaị na mmeri 3 na 1 megide Orlando City.
